short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Activate this extension to download images as PNGs. Right-click any image and use the extension icon to convert it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feeling like you’re losing your mind trying to save web images in the optimal format? Install Download image to PNG Chrome extension that can help you convert any image to PNG in a matter of seconds. To make saving images easier, you just activate this tool and you right click on any image. This extension is very useful in converting images and provides added ease and versatility as it automatically changes images to the PNG format.  

For those who are working on designs, creating content, and even for people who just want to improve their browsing experience, this extension is more than useful. 
 
 
Key Features of This Chrome Extension:

Image Conversion to PNG Format: Specifically designed to convert images to PNG format effortlessly.

Effortless Activation and Usage: Easy to activate and use, requiring minimal effort from the user.

Seamless Chrome Integration: Works well with the Chrome browser and can be easily installed.

Streamlined Image Saving: Simplifies the process of saving images, making it quicker and more efficient.

Enhanced Browsing Experience: Improves overall browsing by providing convenient image conversion and saving capabilities.
 

How to Use: 

Install the Extension:  

Go to the Chrome Web Store and in the search bar type “Download image to PNG. ” Click on ‘Add to Chrome’ and follow the steps to install the extension.

Activate the Extension:  

After installation, the extension icon will be placed in the browser toolbar of your system. 

Convert Images:  

Select any picture that you would like to convert to png format by right clicking on it. 

Download the PNG:  

Right-clicking on the image will open a context menu in which you need to find and click on the ‘Convert to PNG’ option, and the image will be converted on the spot and be ready for downloading.
 

Who is it Useful for and Why?

This extension is useful for a variety of people including bloggers, students, teachers, professionals, and general social media users. The designers can save much time and quickly convert images to PNG format without affecting the quality of images in their projects.  

The integration is smooth, thus is advantageous to content creators, as it improves their ability to select and present materials in a visually appealing manner. Furthermore, by using various formats, general users can save images in a more efficient manner to enhance their browsing experience. 

FAQs 
 
1. Is it possible to open several images at once and perform the conversion using this extension?  

Currently, the extension only supports one input at a time, which means it can only process one image at a time. 
 
2. Can this extension be used for websites with copyright laws on images?  

It works on most websites and adding new extensions to it; however, it may be limited on websites that have strong copyright protection. 

3. Is the conversion from PNG to another format lossless?  

Yes, the extension guarantees that it is possible to convert the image with no loss of quality between the original and the extension. 
 
4. Are there ways through which I can manipulate the conversion settings? 

No, the extension does not have any tweaking features to modify the conversion process of the video. 
 
5. Is this extension collecting any data from users? 

No, the extension does not track any user data at all. We understand the importance of your privacy and security and that is why we offer it to you.
